thread.title: Shaikh Mohammad
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Shaikh Mohammad

author: Shaikh Mohammad
title: Shaikh Mohammad
text: I bought s7 edge dual sim just 3 weeks ago once I get it as I looked it was not the genuine Samsung Phone replica or master copy something like that by typing on the dial pad *#06# and *#0*# and I told them for the refund and they making drama with me which is really bad. I paid for genuine Samsung, not for the replica. as everybody knows that as the Samsung commitment the phone should be water resist or rain proof but its really not working in the rain...I am really upset and I like to get my money back as well.
